channel.title: Minimalism on Alex Che Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Minimalism on Alex Che Personal Website

item.title: Low Tech, High Life. A Cyberpunk World We Deserve.
item.description: Can you tell why I put these two parts together? Well, there are two stories… Stockholm, Sweden 5 or 6 years ago, around 2017, I was out to Stockholm for a workation. Both to work on some business but also to explore the city. Stockholm is an absolutely stunning city: I enjoyed the best coffee, awesome events and very friendly people, not speaking of it being built for comfort.
